welcomeDescription: Your personal service provider platform. Connect with customers, manage jobs, and grow your business - all in one place.
welcomeDrDescription: Thank you for joining HomeServices. Let us guide you through setting up your profile and managing consultations.
findDoctorsDescription: Browse through our list of verified doctors. Search by specialty, view ratings, experience, and consultation fees.
bookConsultationsDescription: Select a doctor, choose an available time slot, and book your consultation. Pay securely through the app.
chatWithDoctorsDescription: Once booked, you can chat with your doctor, share medical reports, and get prescriptions directly in the app.
viewPrescriptionsDescription: Access all your prescriptions and consultation history anytime. Keep track of your health records securely.
completeYourProfileDescription: Set up your professional profile with qualifications, specialties, experience, and consultation fees. Your profile will be reviewed by our admin team.
setYourAvailabilityDescription: Manage your schedule by setting available time slots. Patients can book consultations during these slots.
manageAppointmentsDescription: View upcoming and past appointments. Chat with patients, share prescriptions, and provide medical advice.
createPrescriptionsDescription: Write digital prescriptions for your patients. They can access them anytime from their consultation history.
